title: Customized E-Learning Pathway Modeling for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments with situational language practice using simulations/VR

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more personalized e-learning pathways based on IMS Learning Design standards across different scenarios
Learners can design language acquisition-focused learning pathways in VR simulation environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can autonomously manage e-learning activities utilizing limited technological resources in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
